newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Lam Soon (HK) interim net rises 58 pct.
newsitem.headline: Lam Soon (HK) interim net rises 58 pct.

text.p: Company name Lam Soon (Hong Kong) Ltd
NOTE - Lam Soon (Hong Kong) subsidiaries are engaged in food processing and electronics trading.

Net is after an exceptional gain of HK$29.36 million on disposal of partial interest in subsidiaries, HK$20.98 million on dilution of interest in a subsidiary and HK$42.47 million on disposal of an overseas listed investment.

The group has decided to avail itself of the transitional provision set out in paragraph 73 of the revised Statement of Standard Accounting Practice 17 on October 23, 1995, with the effect that the group's long leasehold land was not depreciated in the financial statements for the year ended 31 December, 1995. An adjustment relating to depreciation charge on long leasehold land was therefore made with the effect that the net profit for 1995 was increased from HK$19.41 million to HK$24.05 million. Comparative share earnings has been adjusted accordingly.
